description: Kakigori Kreamery brings delicious Japanese Shaved Ice to Los Angeles! It takes elements from the Japanese style shaved ice and combines it with American style creamery. It's like eating the lightest, most fluffy snow you've ever had! Top it off with hand made syrups and lot of fun Japanese inspired toppings! Flavors include Strawberry, Green Tea, Cotton Candy, and many more! Stop by Kakigori Kreamery today and have a delicious treat to go.
name: Kakigori Kreamery
